name: Drink the Book: Black Tea Sour
description: In this clever variation on the classic liquor-based sour, bartender Thad Vogler substitutes the assertive flavor of black tea for alcohol. The tannic qualities of the tea provide many of the same qualities as booze and give the drink a delicious backbone which stands up against tart lemon and sweet grenadine.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a shaker (without ice), close and shake well.
Add ice to the shaker, close and shake again.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.
